title: Louis Vuitton Script
content:
Hello

I would be extremely grateful if anyone could please identify both typefaces (the script and the serif) on this label.

Many thanks,

Tom.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120428180615im_/http:/typophile.com/files/vuitton_typeface_4278.jpg)
author: tomnichols

comments.content:
The lettering all appears custom (hand-drawn) to me. Notice the variations in letters that should be identical. I would not expect Louis Vuitton to be using fonts that were commercially available, if they used fonts at all (except for ad copy).

- Mike Yanega
Thanks for the feedback, I think you're right; I should have noticed that myself! Thanks again.
